price: Yoo Rabbiin aalama hundaa fedhe malee isin homaa hin feetanu.
arabic: وَمَا تَشَآءُونَ إِلَّآ أَن يَشَآءَ ٱللَّهُ رَبُّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wamā tashāūna illā an yashāa al-lahu rabbu al-ʿālamīna
